english.segment1: What is all this? The question I am asking. It's not what is I feel like I was promised
english.segment2: This hurts, this leaves a lasting laceration. I can't believe that this is what my faith was for
english.segment3: The scars remain, reminds of pain. The scars remain
english.segment4: When I see You, I see scars that are matching. When I see You, I see scars that are matching. I know what I'm feeling. You are feeling scars remaining through. When I see You, I see scars
english.segment5: My feet will sink in this quicksand around me. Unless Something or Someone comes to save me
english.segment6: This hurts, this leaves a lasting laceration. I can't believe that this is what my faith was for
english.segment7: The scars remain. Reminds of pain. The scars remain. When I see you I see scars that are matching. When I see you I see scars that are matching. I know what I'm feeling you are feeling scars remaining through. When I see you I see scars
english.segment8: When I see you I see scars that are matching. When I see you I see scars that are matching. I know what I'm feeling you are feeling scars remaining through. When I see you I see scars that are matching
